short_description: fastpath function to get rows with NULL values.
long_description: fastpath function to get rows with NULL values.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.

argument_clauses.name: TargetColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns in which NULL values needs to be checked. By default all the input table columns are considered as TargetColumns
